input_text:
Job Title: Seasonal Forklift Operator

Location: Waseca, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Shift: This role is 2nd Shift, 6:00 PM-6:00 AM

Hourly Rate: $16.42 an hour

Conagra Brand's Waseca, Minnesota plant has an opportunity for Onsite Seasonal Forklift Operators in Cold Storage department. Seasonal demand begins again in June and continues through October. Second shift positions are available. Conagra provides training, full time hours and scheduled overtime.

Industry specific training will be provided. Forklift operators receive workplace evaluation and guidance for job performance. The Forklift Operator maintains expected level of task completion in a safe manner and maintaining the highest quality.

Department: Cold Storage and will report to cold storage Manager

SEASONAL â€“ LIFT TRUCK OPERATOR (FORK LIFT DRIVER)

Responsibilities

Qualify for and be physically able to operate a lift truck in a safe and efficient manner.Conduct daily maintenance checks on the truck assigned such as checking the proper oil and water levels, etc.Responsible for reporting all mechanical defects to the supervisor.Keep accurate and legible records as required.Be able to work in any area throughout the plant.Be able to high stack product containers and stage finished goods for transfer.Must ensure trailers are chocked properly and that dock plates are placed in trailers properly before loading and unloadingKeep work area clean and clean foreign material off of the fork lift as you using before the end of your shift.Report all damage to forklift and any other company property to your supervisor.Perform other duties as assigned.Have good attendance and work record.Be able to work overtime and weekends.Responsible for observing all safety rules and regulations set forth by Conagra Brands.Will comply with Conagra's GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices).Available to work different shifts and overtime including weekends


Specifications

Be mentally and physically able to perform the entire job.Must pass the Conagra Brands lift truck test.


Anticipated Close Date: June 10, 2024

Location: Waseca, Minnesota

Our Benefits

We care about your total well-being and will support you with the following, subject to your location and role:

Health: Medical, dental and vision insurance, company-paid life, accident and disability insuranceWealth: great pay, 401(k) and stock purchase planGrowth: online courses, virtual and on-site development experiencesBalance: paid-time off


Our Company

Conagra Brands is one of North America's leading branded food companies. Guided by an entrepreneurial spirit, our Company combines a rich heritage of making great food with a sharpened focus on innovation. Our portfolio is evolving to satisfy people's changing food preferences. Our iconic brands, such as Birds Eye, Duncan Hines, Healthy Choice, Marie Callender's, Reddi-wip, and Slim Jim, and emerging brands, including Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP, Duke's, Earth Balance, Gardein, and Frontera, offer choices for every occasion.

We pride ourselves on having the most impactful, energized and inclusive culture in the food industry. For more information, visit www.conagrabrands.com.

Conagra Brands is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, color, religion, ethnic or national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, pregnancy, leave status, disability, veteran status, genetic information and/or any other characteristic or status protected by national, federal, state or local law.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Seasonal Forklift Operator
output_json.summary: Onsite Seasonal Forklift Operators needed in Cold Storage department.
job_responsibilities: Qualify for and be physically able to operate a lift truck in a safe and efficient manner.
Conduct daily maintenance checks on the truck assigned such as checking the proper oil and water levels, etc.
Responsible for reporting all mechanical defects to the supervisor.
Keep accurate and legible records as required.
Be able to work in any area throughout the plant.
Be able to high stack product containers and stage finished goods for transfer.
Must ensure trailers are chocked properly and that dock plates are placed in trailers properly before loading and unloading.
Keep work area clean and clean foreign material off of the fork lift as you using before the end of your shift.
Report all damage to forklift and any other company property to your supervisor.
Have good attendance and work record.
Be able to work overtime and weekends.
Responsible for observing all safety rules and regulations set forth by Conagra Brands.
Will comply with Conagra's GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices).
Available to work different shifts and overtime including weekends.
output_json.physical_requirements: Be mentally and physically able to perform the entire job. Must pass the Conagra Brands lift truck test.
benefits: Health: Medical, dental and vision insurance, company-paid life, accident and disability insurance
Wealth: great pay, 401(k) and stock purchase plan
Growth: online courses, virtual and on-site development experiences

Guided by an entrepreneurial spirit, our Company combines a rich heritage of making great food with a sharpened focus on innovation. Our portfolio is evolving to satisfy people's changing food preferences. Our iconic brands, such as Birds Eye, Duncan Hines, Healthy Choice, Marie Callender's, Reddi-wip, and Slim Jim, and emerging brands, including Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP, Duke's, Earth Balance, Gardein, and Frontera, offer choices for every occasion.
